itunes:title: #7: When It's Hard to Let Go of a Relationship
title: #7: When It's Hard to Let Go of a Relationship
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Sometimes, even when you know it's time to end a relationship, it's hard to let go. In this episode, Shena digs into 3 reasons it's hard to let go, how this sets you back, and some next steps you can take to move forward.   Take Our Free...
itunes:summary:
Sometimes, even when you know it's time to end a relationship, it's hard to let go. In this episode, Shena digs into 3 reasons it's hard to let go, how this sets you back, and some next steps you can take to move forward.
